p: The supporting information file S1 File contains a wide range of additional subnational results for each country: (i) smoothed regional estimates of the U5MR through time, (ii) unsmoothed, direct regional estimates from each DHS survey, (iii) a comparison of the smoothed versus unsmoothed regional direct estimates, (iv) one-year and five-year estimates by regions, and (v) cross-validation results.
